lead_paragraph: Peru’s electoral council on Wednesday blocked the candidacy of the main challenger to the front-runner, Keiko Fujimori, in the April 10 presidential elections.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Peru: Candidate Barred From Race

snippet: Peru’s electoral council on Wednesday blocked the candidacy of the main challenger to the front-runner, Keiko Fujimori, in the April 10 presidential elections.
abstract: Peru's electoral council blocks candidacy of Julio Guzman, main challenger to front-runner Keiko Fujimori, in April 10 presidential elections.
